text: brrda phu sraththa thanghlay cng bricakh swn hnung cak brrda sing di «khxng sing thi phwk cea di sæwngha wi læa cak sing thi rea di hı xxk ma cak din sahrab phwk cea læa phwk cea xya mung xea sing thi lew cak man mab ri cakh thang «thi phwk cea xeng k michı ca pen phurab man wi nxkcak wa phwk cea ca hlabta nı kar rab man theanan læa phung ru theid wa thæ cring xallxhˌ nan pen phuthrng mangmi phuthrng di rab kar srrseriy
